text: Hi there! I’m using OrdinaryDiffEq to integrate incremental constitutive laws in solid mechanics. I have a state variable `D` that should only be allowed to grow and whose value must be higher or equal to some initial value `D0`. My derivatives update function is built so that `D` can only increase with time, but I keep facing solves returning me `AssertionError` relative to `D` being lower than `D0` at some point during integration. Any clue on what may happen?
